Texts.Chs: 在攻击命中时有20%的几率让对方中毒。
Texts.Eng: +20% Chance to Poison monsters on hit.

Texts.Chs:
+20%饥饿速率
只有80%的最大生命
双持单手武器时基础攻击力增加至120%。
Texts.Eng: 120% Base Power while dual-wielding One-Handed Weapons.

An upgrade to Double Jump, press [Space] to launch yourself in a direction of your choosing, leaving a cloud of smoke behind that disorients enemies. Disoriented enemies are slowed and do less damage. Defaults to a backwards launch.
Texts.value: 升级版的二段跳，按[空格键]将自己发射到你选择的方向，在敌人身后留下一团烟雾。失去方向感的敌人会被减速并减少其造成的伤害。未指定方向的话默认为向后发射。

Texts.Chs: 不能使用双手远程武器或魔法武器。
Texts.Eng: Cannot use Two-Handed Ranged Weapons or Magic Weapons.

Texts.Chs: 按[F]转换成对毒免疫的荆刺球。变形状态下点击左键放出一圈毒云（随灵巧值提升伤害）。按住鼠标右键可消耗饱腹度以恢复生命和能量。
Texts.Eng: Press [F] to transform into a poison-immune Spike Sphere. Left click while transformed to shoot out a ring of poison clouds (Damage scales with Dexterity). Hold Right Click while transformed to decrease your Hunger Bar to regenerate Health and Energy.

Texts.Chs: 按[G]（在按键设置中绑定[G]）来制造一个毒素光环，用弱化毒药伤害敌人。这些敌人将会受到更多的毒素和流血伤害，当没有能量时关闭。
Texts.Eng: Press [G] (Bind [G] in your Controls) to toggle a toxic field that inflicts enemies with a weakening poison. These enemies take more poison and bleed damage. Drains energy while active, and is toggled off when no energy remains.

Texts.Chs: 按[G]（在按键设置中绑定[G]）以切换一种增加物理和毒性抵抗并给予击退免疫的能力。当激活时消耗能量，当没有能量时关闭。
Texts.Eng: Press [G] (Bind [G] in your Controls) to toggle an ability that increases Physical and Poison Resistance and grants Knockback Immunity. Drains energy while active, and is toggled off when no energy remains.

Texts.Chs: 当你的饱腹度至少半满时，+20%的毒抗。
Texts.Eng: While your Food Meter is filled at least halfway, gain +20% Poison Resistance.
